verses.name: 1 Chronicles 17:1
verses.text: Now it came to pass, as David sat in his house, that David said to Nathan the prophet, Lo, I dwell in an house of cedars, but the ark of the covenant of the Lord remaineth under curtains.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 17:2
verses.text: Then Nathan said unto David, Do all that is in thine heart; for God is with thee.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 17:3
verses.text: And it came to pass the same night, that the word of God came to Nathan, saying,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 17:4
verses.text: Go and tell David my servant, Thus saith the Lord, Thou shalt not build me an house to dwell in:
